## mul variable

Componentwise matrix addition. Use `mulM` for actual matrix-matrix multiplication. If `out` is not given, writes result in `a`<!-- -->.

out = a \* b

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mul: MultiMatOpMM
```
